Scorpius.Distance: 980 ly (distance to Ptolemy Cluster, near the "stinger") (see also Wikipedia - Scorpius)
Scorpius.Notes: Scorpius, "The Scorpion", is the constellation that corresponds to the Zodiacal sign of Scorpio. Its brightest star is Antares. Near the "stinger" is a naked eye open star cluster called the Ptolemy Cluster(M7), which has been known since ancient times. Also, the Butterfly Cluster(M6).
